properties.description: Put any relevant initial articles for the title_of_work into this column. The rest of the title of the work, sans initial article, should appear in the title_of_work column.
properties.title: Initial Article

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.

options.Author: Author

index.key: Author in quotations or text abstracts

options.index: Author in quotations or text abstracts
options.Creator: Creator
options.Speaker: Speaker

properties.title: roleTerm(s)

properties.description:
aat -- http://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/aat/index.html
lctgm -- http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/tgm2/
marcgt -- http://www.loc.gov/standards/valuelist/marcgt.html
properties.title: Authority

properties.description:
A term that best describes the content of the resource. Please select the authority that applies to the term entered in genre.
Use form to describe the resource (not the content).
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Human Readable Date. Free format. No abbreviations. REQUIRED. If you do not fill in this box, the form submission will fail.
properties.title: Readable Date

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created START

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created END

properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language

properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language Of Cataloging

properties.description: Indicates a link to the object within the context of its environment (with associated metadata, navigation, etc.).
properties.title: Object in Context

properties.description: Enter the name of the holding institution.
properties.title: Repository

properties.description: Enter the name of a subunit of the holding institution if applicable.
properties.title: Sub Repository

properties.description: Enter box/folder, call number or other locational information.
properties.title: Shelf Locator

properties.description: This is the URL that links to a thumbnail file of the digitized object. These will be added upon Islandora ingest or by the metadata librarian.
properties.title: Thumbnail

properties.description: Enter the name of the relevant archival collection if applicable using the name that appears in the Archival Collections discovery layer (Scout). Do not use abbreviations.
properties.title: Collection

properties.description: Include the identifier for the physical collection that the item to be digitized is a part of.
properties.title: Collection Identifier

properties.description: Enter information regarding the origin, custody, and ownership of an item, e.g., Gift of Robert Biggert in honor of Lisa Ann Riveaux.
properties.title: Note (Provenance)

properties.description: Enter any relevant information that should be publicly viewable but that does not belong in any of the other fields.
properties.title: Note (Public)

properties.description: Use to convey questions or problems to project staff. This field will not be displayed publicly.
properties.title: Note (Private)

properties.description:
local -- https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16jPboHUoBS5ZfuopZGoBd5RF79qcE9hHw9QwYNPYzBY/edit?pli=1#gid=0

properties.title: Authority

properties.description:
A term that best describes the resource. Please select the authority that applies to the term entered in form.
Use genre to describe the content of the resource (not the resource itself).
properties.title: Form

properties.default_value: mods:note authority attribute is fixed now
properties.title: Note

properties.description:
Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
Latitude: 35.964668 N
Longitude: -83.926453 W
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.default_value: The copyright interests in this item remain with the creator. For more information, contact Special Coll. at special@utk.edu.
properties.description:
Use one of the following options:
  • The copyright interests in this item remain with the creator. For more information, contact Special Collections at special@utk.edu.
  • May be protected by copyright. For more information, contact Special Collections at special@utk.edu.
  • No known copyright restrictions.
  • Public domain.
    • See more info on the Metadata Wiki: UTK Data Dictionary
properties.title: Rights (mods:accessCondition)

properties.description: To be generated by digital initiatives/metadata librarian.
properties.title: recordOrigin

properties.description: Autogenerated to be University of Tennessee Libraries and Special Collections. Enter information only if this differs.
properties.title: recordContentSource
